label.ar: توفير العمالة اللازمة المدربة والمؤهلة اللازمة لتشغيل محطة معالجة سوائل الصرف الصحي بخبرة سابقة في تشغيل المحطات ويتم اعتمادها من الطرف الأول
label.en: Provision of the necessary trained and qualified personnel to operate the wastewater treatment plant, with prior experience in plant operation, and approved by the first party.

label.en: Personnel presence at the plant 24 hours a day.

label.ar: زيارة دورية شهرية لمسئولي إدارة التشغيل والصيانة وتقديم تقرير شهري للطرف الأول بحالة المحطة
label.en: Monthly periodic visit by the operation and maintenance management personnel, with a monthly report submitted to the first party on the plant's condition.

label.en: All items not mentioned in our technical proposal.

label.en: Provision of a power source connected to the main control panel, sufficient for the continuous operation of the plant and compliant with the required specifications.

label.en: Provision of wastewater in the quantities and specifications indicated in the plant design.

label.en: Provision of a fresh water source for testing purposes.

label.en: Provision of a safe method for disposing of excess sludge and disinfecting the tanks.

label.ar: توريد قطع الغيار الخاصة بأعمال الصيانة بالمحطة, وفي حال طلب سيادتكم توفيرها من خلال شركتنا يتم توفيرها بعد اعتماد السعر بفاتورة منفصلة
label.en: Supply of spare parts for plant maintenance. If you request to procure them through our company, they will be provided after price approval with a separate invoice.

label.en: Provision of consumable materials such as filter media, air diffusers, spare parts, and equipment that become damaged due to their expected lifespan or exceeding the number of maintenance cycles, according to the operation and maintenance manual for each device.

label.ar: توفير معدات التنظيف
label.en: Supply cleaning equipment

label.ar: توفير الفنيين (نوبة نهارية / ليلية) لضمان جودة التنفيذ والإشراف على العمليات
label.en: Provision of Technicians (Day/Night shift) to ensure quality execution and oversee operations.
